formattedAddress: 432 W 20th St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 432 W 20th St, New York, NY 10011-2902, USA

originalText.text:
This is a women's residence. It has public bathrooms.
I appreciated their hospitality. It was very clean and quiet.

text.text:
This is a women's residence. It has public bathrooms.
I appreciated their hospitality. It was very clean and quiet.

originalText.text: El mejor lugar para mujeres para quedarse en Manhattan. Las madres son muy amables y amorosas y nos hicieron sentir siempre como en casa, al igual que las residentes. La comida es deliciosa, las habitaciones súper limpias y la ubicación, inmejorable.

text.text: Best place for women to stay in Manhattan. The mothers are very kind and loving and always made us feel at home, as did the residents. The food is delicious, the rooms super clean and the location unbeatable.

originalText.text: Esta muy bien ubicado. Solo para mujeres. Se contacta por mail y debes completar formulario para pedir aprobación y te autoricen a hospedarte. Es austero, sencillo, en un edificio muy antiguo, sin lujos ni alta tecnología. Lo cual lo hace un lugar adorable. Uno se siente " como en casa". La atención es excelente. Es una residencia que pertenece a una congregación católica de hermanas. Al lado funciona una nursery de la misma institución.

text.text: It is very well located. Only for women. You are contacted by email and you must complete the form to request approval and be authorized to stay. It is austere, simple, in a very old building, without luxuries or high technology. Which makes it an adorable place. You feel "at home". The attention is excellent. It is a residence that belongs to a Catholic congregation of sisters. Next door there is a nursery from the same institution.

originalText.text: Chicas esta residencia es todo lo que esta bien! Ubicacion excelente muy lindo barrio ,muy limpio ! La gente es amigable y te ayuda en todo! Es excelente! Las camas son comodisimas! 10 puntos!

text.text: Girls this residence is everything that is good! Excellent location, very nice neighborhood, very clean! The people are friendly and help you with everything! It's excellent! The beds are very comfortable! 10 points!

originalText.text: Es un alojamiento para mujeres regentado por la orden de las hermanas del sagrado corazón. Estuve en febrero de 2008. Las instalaciones estaban muy limpias, en el precio entraba el desayuno y la cena  (esta ultima de lunes a viernes). Hay una cocina donde poder cocinar así como guardar los alimentos en neveras. Calidad-precio insuperable. La única pega que a las 11 de la noche toque de queda si no habías llegado a tiempo ya no podías entrar.

text.text: It is a women's accommodation run by the order of the Sisters of the Sacred Heart. I was there in February 2008. The facilities were very clean, the price included breakfast and dinner (the latter from Monday to Friday). There is a kitchen where you can cook as well as store food in refrigerators. Unbeatable quality-price. The only downside is that at 11 pm curfew if you had not arrived on time you could no longer enter.
